document_data.mainbody:
he Thieves Guildhall was the headquarters of the naug-orls in the city of Zhentil Keep during the midâ€“14 century DR.
The guildhall was located in Zhentil Keeps Inner Quarter in the southwest on the Street of Bones
The Thieves Guildhall was a fortified structure and stood four storys tall. The guildhalls basement connected directly to Zhentil Keeps sewer system, which was used extensively for illicit operations.
The naug-orls used this location as a base of operations, a training area, and living area.
Most of the thieves who lived here had not yet accumulated enough wealth to purchase their own homes elsewhere in Zhentil Keep.
